title: Side Effects of Being Underestimated (with Arlan Hamilton)
description:
This week, we tap into our money minds with investor/venture capitalist Arlan Hamilton, author of It’s About Damn Time, who helps us make sense of how to use ourselves to make cents.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
